result.title: Front End Web Developer(React)
result.description:
Responsibilities

· Design, develop, and test significant web application features Minecraft education
· Collaborate across teams to tackle tasks by bringing together all the pieces to provide customers with intuitive, effortless experiences.
· Multitask between features, platforms and projects fluidly.

 
Required skills and experience:

· 3+ years of professional web development experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on an ASP.NET backend.
· Familiarity with jQuery and React.js frameworks.
· Have experience with UI/UX development.
· 4+ years of enterprise software design, development, and testing that meet functional, performance, and fundamentals requirements.
· Experience with responsive design using frameworks such as Bootstrap.
· Experience interacting with external web services.
· Ability to work both independently and in conjunction with other team members.
· Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalence.
result.notes: The hiring manager is Chinese, and the interview process is very simple, just 1 hour-1 round online interview.  Cannot Sponsor H1B candidate
